event.title: FSFE Berlin local group meeting in Berlin, Germany

body.p: The FSFE Berlin local group meets in-person every second Thursday of each month to discuss topics related to Free Software. Everyone who is interested in software freedom in welcome to join. Bring good vibes! The meeting is in German, at 19:00, parallel to the Linux Works LUG meeting. We meet at E-LOK in Laskerstra√üe 4-6, not far from Ostkreuz station.
